mapper.insert: insert into pay_passageway(passageway_name, passageway_id, encryption_type, pay_type, mch_id, mch_key, app_id, app_secret, is_use) values (#{pp.passagewayName},#{pp.passagewayId},#{pp.encryptionType},#{pp.payType},#{pp.mchId}, #{pp.mchKey},#{pp.appId},#{pp.appSecret},#{pp.isUse})
mapper.update: update pay_passageway set passageway_name=#{pp.passagewayName}, passageway_id=#{pp.passagewayId}, encryption_type=#{pp.encryptionType}, pay_type=#{pp.payType}, mch_id=#{pp.mchId}, mch_key=#{pp.mchKey}, app_id=#{pp.appId}, app_secret=#{pp.appSecret}, is_use=#{pp.isUse} where id = #{pp.id}
mapper.select: select * from pay_passageway order by is_use desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
